Package solidbase.core

This is the core of SolidBase.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
CommandListener A CommandListener listens to commands from the upgrade or SQL file as they are being processed.
ConnectionListener A listener to listen to connection events.
 

Class Summary
Command Represents a command in an upgrade or SQL file.
CommandProcessor Processes commands, maintains state, triggers the listeners.
Database Manages connections to the database.
DBVersion This class represents the version information in the database.
Fragment An SQL fragment.
InitConnectionFragment An SQL fragment.
Patch Represents a single patch in the patch file.
PatchFile This class manages the patch file contents and the paths between versions.
PatchProcessor This class is the coordinator.
PatchSource The source for command from a patch file.
Path An upgrade path.
PluginManager Reads plugins from the classpath.
ProgressListener Listener adapter.
SQLFile This class manages an SQL file's contents.
SQLProcessor This class is the coordinator.
SQLSource Source for SQL statements.
Util Some utilities.
 

Enum Summary
Patch.Type The possible types of a patch.
 

Exception Summary
CommandFileException Represents a problem in the file (upgrade file or SQL file).
FatalException Represents an expected failure caused by a system check.
NonDelimitedStatementException Exception that is thrown when a statement is not delimited with the current delimiter.
SQLExecutionException An SQLException has occurred during execution of a Command.
SystemException Use this exception for throwing system faults.
 

Package solidbase.core Description

This is the core of SolidBase. It has no dependencies whatsoever to other packages.
